name: Hwei
title: the Visionary
shortBio: Hwei is a brooding painter who creates brilliant art in order to confront Ionia's criminals and comfort their victims. Beneath his melancholy roils a torn, emotional mindâ€”haunted by both the vibrant visions of his imagination and the gruesome memories of his temple's massacre. Hwei seeks to understand this light and dark, which drives him inevitably toward the artist who unraveled him. With paintbrush and palette, Hwei shapes endless possibilities as he draws ever closer to earning closure or embracing despair.

skins.name: Winterblessed Hwei

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Winterblessed event.

skins.description: The herald of Polaris, Hwei, waited in a despondent mood. When Senna and Hecarim found him among the world of man, a violent blizzard raged overhead. As herald, he used his brush to paint the Aurora across the skies, bringing the first snow. At Hecarim's beckoning, he waved his brush, parting the clouds to reveal a barren sky. Where was the Aurora?

passive.name: Signature of the Visionary
passive.description:
Hwei primes enemy champions he damages with his abilities for his signature finishing touch.

Hitting an enemy with a second damaging spell completes his signature, leaving it beneath them. The signature detonates after a short delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies in range.

spells.name: Subject: Disaster
spells.description:
Hwei envisions a series of disasters, allowing him to paint a devastating blow.

This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with damaging abilities: Devastating Fire, Severing Bolt, and Molten Fissure.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Hwei paints visions of disaster that deal large damage to enemies.

Devastating Fire
Hwei launches a blazing fast fireball that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing @Tooltip_QQDamage@ plus @Tooltip_QQBonusDamage@% max health magic damage.

Severing Bolt
Hwei strikes over far distances with a delayed lightning bolt, dealing @Tooltip_QWDamage@ magic damage. Hitting an Isolated or Immobilized target increases the damage up to @Tooltip_QWBonusDamage@ magic damage, based on the target's missing health.

Molten Fissure
Hwei unleashes a path of eruptions, dealing @Tooltip_QEDamage@ magic damage in an area and leaving behind pools of lava that Slow enemies by @spell.HweiQE:SlowPercent@% and deal @Tooltip_QEDamagePerSecond@ magic damage per second for @spell.HweiQE:Duration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Subject: Serenity
spells.description:
Hwei envisions a series of serenities, allowing him to paint invigorating settings.

This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with utility abilities: Fleeting Current, Pool of Reflection, and Stirring Lights.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Hwei paints visions of serenity that provide utility for himself and allied champions.

Fleeting Current
Hwei launches a current of swift waters in a line that grants allies @Tooltip_WQMoveSpeed@ Move Speed.

Pool of Reflection
Hwei forms a protective pool that grants @Tooltip_WWShieldAmount@ Shields over time to allied champions inside reduced by @spell.HweiWW:AllyMod*100@% for allies.

Stirring Lights
Hwei creates three swirling lights that empower his next three Abilities or Attacks to deal an additional @Tooltip_WEOnHitDamage@ magic damage and restore @Tooltip_WEOnHitManaRestore@ Mana each.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Subject: Torment
spells.description:
Hwei envisions a series of torments, allowing him to paint controlling visages.

This ability replaces Hwei's abilities with crowd control abilities: Grim Visage, Gaze of the Abyss, and Crushing Maw.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Hwei paints visions of torment that control enemies.

Grim Visage
Hwei launches a terrifying face that causes the first enemy hit to Flee for @Tooltip_EQFleeDuration@ second(s) and take @Tooltip_EQDamage@ magic damage.

Gaze of the Abyss
Hwei forms an eye that lingers and provides vision locking onto the first enemy champion that enters and launching a homing missile that Roots the first enemy hit for @Tooltip_EWRootDuration@ seconds dealing @Tooltip_EWDamage@ magic damage.

Crushing Maw
Hwei paints a set of jaws at a target location that Drags enemies to the center dealing @Tooltip_EEDamage@ magic damage and Slowing enemies caught by @Tooltip_EESlowAmount@% decaying over 1.25 seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Spiraling Despair
spells.description: Hwei paints a vision of pure despair. The first enemy champion struck becomes the center of an expanding painting that slows and damages nearby enemies. The vision explodes after reaching its maximum size or when the champion dies.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Hwei launches a vision of pure despair that sticks to an enemy champion for @Duration@ seconds. The vision expands over time applying a Slow to enemies for @SlowPercentPerStack@% stacking every 0.25 seconds, and dealing @DamageOverTime@ magic damage per second.

Upon completion, the vision shatters, dealing @Damage@ magic damage.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spellbookOverride.name: Devastating Fire
spellbookOverride.description: Hwei paints a blazing fireball that explodes upon hitting an enemy unit or at the end of its path.
spellbookOverride.dynamicDescription: Hwei paints a blazing fireball that flies out in the target direction. It explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing <magicDamage>@spell.HweiQ:Tooltip_QQDamage@ plus @spell.HweiQ:Tooltip_QQBonusDamage@% max health magic damage</magicDamage> to all enemies in an area.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spellbookOverride.name: Severing Bolt
spellbookOverride.description: Hwei paints a long-distance, long wind-up lightning bolt that deals extra damage to immobilized or isolated targets at low health.
spellbookOverride.dynamicDescription: Hwei paints a long-range, delayed lightning bolt at the target location, dealing <magicDamage>@spell.HweiQ:Tooltip_QWDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>. Isolated or <status>Immobilized</status> enemies take increased damage based on missing health, up to <magicDamage>@spell.HweiQ:Tooltip_QWBonusDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spellbookOverride.name: Molten Fissure
spellbookOverride.description: Hwei paints a field of volcanic eruptions that leaves lava in its path.
spellbookOverride.dynamicDescription: Hwei paints a field of exploding volcanic eruptions, creating lingering lava in its path. Every eruption deals <magicDamage>@spell.HweiQ:Tooltip_QEDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage> to enemies hit. Enemies in the lava area are dealt <magicDamage>@spell.HweiQ:Tooltip_QEDamagePerSecond@ magic damage per second</magicDamage> and <status>Slowed</status> by @spell.HweiQE:SlowPercent@%. Each lava pool lasts @spell.HweiQE:Duration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spellbookOverride.name: Wash Brush
spellbookOverride.description: Hwei clears his paintbrush and returns to base abilities without using mana or cooldowns. Only available while Subject: Disaster, Subject: Serenity, or Subject: Torment are active.
spellbookOverride.dynamicDescription: Hwei clears his paintbrush and returns to base Abilities. Does not cost Mana or Cooldowns.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spellbookOverride.name: Fleeting Current
spellbookOverride.description: Hwei paints a current of swift waters in a line that grants movement speed to himself and allies.
spellbookOverride.dynamicDescription: Hwei paints a current of swift waters in a line for @spell.HweiW:Tooltip_WQAreaDuration@ seconds that grants <speed>@spell.HweiW:Tooltip_WQMoveSpeed@ Move Speed</speed> to himself and allied champions.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spellbookOverride.name: Pool of Reflection
spellbookOverride.description: Hwei paints a protective pool at a location that grants shields to allies.
spellbookOverride.dynamicDescription: Hwei paints a protective pool at the target location that lasts for @spell.HweiWW:AreaDuration@ seconds granting an immediate <shield>@spell.HweiW:Tooltip_WWStartShieldAmount@ Shields</shield>, increasing up to <shield>@spell.HweiW:Tooltip_WWShieldAmount@ Shields</shield> over @spell.HweiWW:SecsToFullStack@ seconds to allied champions in the area reduced by @spell.HweiWW:AllyMod*100@% for allies.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spellbookOverride.name: Stirring Lights
spellbookOverride.description: Hwei paints three swirling lights that grant his next three spells or attacks bonus magic damage and mana restoration.
spellbookOverride.dynamicDescription: Hwei paints three swirling lights that circle him causing his next three Abilities or Attacks to deal an additional <magicDamage>@spell.HweiW:Tooltip_WEOnHitDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage> and grant <scaleMana>@spell.HweiW:Tooltip_WEOnHitManaRestore@ Mana</scaleMana> on hit.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spellbookOverride.name: Wash Brush
spellbookOverride.description: Hwei clears his paintbrush and returns to base abilities without using mana or cooldowns. Only available while Subject: Disaster, Subject: Serenity, or Subject: Torment are active.
spellbookOverride.dynamicDescription: Hwei clears his paintbrush and returns to base Abilities. Does not cost Mana or Cooldowns.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spellbookOverride.name: Grim Visage
spellbookOverride.description: Hwei paints a terrifying face that damages the first enemy it hits and causes them to flee.
spellbookOverride.dynamicDescription: Hwei launches a terrifying face that strikes the first enemy hit, causing them to <status>Flee</status> for @spell.HweiEQ:FleeDuration@ second(s) and dealing <magicDamage>@spell.HweiE:Tooltip_EQDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spellbookOverride.name: Gaze of the Abyss
spellbookOverride.description: Hwei paints an eye at the target location that grants vision and stares at the first enemy champion that enters its range. The eye then launches at them, rooting the first enemy hit.
spellbookOverride.dynamicDescription: Hwei paints an abyssal eye at the target location that grants vision, locking onto the nearest enemy champion and launches a homing missile at them <status>Rooting</status> the first enemy in its path for @spell.HweiE:Tooltip_EWRootDuration@ seconds and dealing <magicDamage>@spell.HweiE:Tooltip_EWDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spellbookOverride.name: Crushing Maw
spellbookOverride.description: Hwei paints a set of jaws that bites down on enemies, dragging them to the center and slowing them.
spellbookOverride.dynamicDescription: Hwei paints crushing jaws that deal <magicDamage>@spell.HweiE:Tooltip_EEDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage> to enemies hit and <status>Drags</status> them toward the center, <status>Slowing</status> them by @spell.HweiE:Tooltip_EESlowAmount@% that decays over 1.25 seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spellbookOverride.name: Wash Brush
spellbookOverride.description: Hwei clears his paintbrush and returns to base abilities without using mana or cooldowns. Only available while Subject: Disaster, Subject: Serenity, or Subject: Torment are active.
spellbookOverride.dynamicDescription: Hwei clears his paintbrush and returns to base Abilities. Does not cost Mana or Cooldowns.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
